title: New: Bruno Major – The First Thing You See
body:
**Bruno Major** just ‘gets’ pop music.

His songwriting is crafted to near absolute perfection – whilst he clearly understands the nuances of his own vocal, showcasing a deliberate yet delicate amount of control on new track, _The First Thing You See_. Sure, it’s slightly cheesy, but it’s bound to make more than a few hearts crumble. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
